name: Tank Game!
description:
This is a simple tank game where your objective is to defeat the enemy tank and try to aim for a high score!

W and S moves forward and backward, A and D rotates, Space to shoot. 

Both the player's and enemy's bullets are able to bounce off the walls and crates. The crates in the level are randomly placed and rotated, giving a new experience every time. 

Each time the enemy tank is defeated, it will increase it's level and increase the score. The enemy will be faster, shoot faster and more frequently.

You have 5 lives in total, if you get hit by enemy bullets 5 times then you return to the main menu.

This was made using Kenny's Assets for the tank assets: https://kenney.nl/assets/topdown-tanks-redux

Pop SFX by Mark DiAngelo, explosion SFX from general midi sounds
